text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been hours since arriving at this<n>mystery location with
Gold Ship.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whooshhh...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ahhhh, I feel reborn... The sweet<n>hydration is spreading
through my<n>whole body...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Has me thinking... Y'know when<n>dried seaweed is
rehydrated? I<n>wonder if it feels just like this...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For some reason, we're just<n>relaxing here, sipping on the
juice<n>from the coconut Gold Ship split with<n>her bare
hands.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The sound of the waves, together<n>with the sweet coconut
water, really<n>helps with my fatigue.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's kind of strange, but I feel like I<n>could do this forever...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Heh... Looks like you're finally<n>starting to loosen up.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ain't this great? Sometimes you just<n>gotta take the time to
do nothing at all.
choice_data_list: Do you spend a lot of time relaxing like this?
Do you spend a lot of time relaxing like this?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Sure, when I need to. They do say<n>every warrior has their
resting place.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Warrior in this case being a figure of<n>speech for an
Umamusume racer. Or if<n>you wanna be real slick, I used a<n>
"metaphor."

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And how do I put this... There's no<n>place hotter than a
racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Even normally quiet Umamusume<n>show their true natures
during a race.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Everyone gives it their all, and that's<n>when I can really let
loose. I feel my<n>body burn so hot that I get this huge<n>relief
from it.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Yup, even if you made me choose<n>between racing and
catching toads,<n>I'd choose racing every time.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And this place... I can really relax<n>here, yup...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whooshhh...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That sound of the waves crashing...<n>Hear it? That's the real
beauty of<n>nature...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whooshhh...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ahh... So therapeutic... Spending my<n>life here wouldn't be
bad at all...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Aaahhh...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: AAAAGHHH!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hoooly smokes! I finally feel it—theburnin' frustration!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
When you dance away from the<n>pressure of the race and
spend too<n>much time restin'! The pent-up<n>hunger to race!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
It's the impulse that drives us! The<n>fire! The burning! The
explosion!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: This is it! This is the hunger that I've<n>been starving to get!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What're you waiting for, Trainer?!<n>We're going home—right
now!
choice_data_list: What the heck is going on?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Weren't you listening? We've done<n>what we came to do.
Time to go back!
choice_data_list: But I don't know what we came here for!
But I don't know what we came here for!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Geez, can you get any slower? What<n>are you, a snail? From
Planet of the<n>Snails?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
If I don't burn with hunger before a<n>race, I won't get hot
enough to run!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Now though? It's perfect. I'm<n>absolutely dying to run!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Good thing too, my race is tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hm? Wait... I didn't tell ya?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wow, sorry 'bout that. ☆ Turns out<n>my debut race is
tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You and the whole country'll be in<n>tears after you witness
my dazzling<n>moves! Woooo! I'm on fire!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
So, let's hit the road! And no, you<n>can't take the coconut!
Dispose of it<n>properly in the sand!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Now where's home... Not a clue, but<n>that way looks
promising! Coming?<n>You better keep up!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just when I was starting to figure outthis treasure hunt, it's time to goback... To be continued
